flusspferd::method

flusspferd::method Struct Reference
[Creating values, objects and functions]

Tag class for flusspferd::create. More...

#include <flusspferd/create/function.hpp>

Detailed Description

Tag class for flusspferd::create.

Used as an alternative to flusspferd::function when the first C++ parameter should be the Javascript 'this' object.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • include/flusspferd/create/function.hpp
